quality_assessment: Page is well-documented with comprehensive coverage of commit validation troubleshooting. The content accurately reflects the codebase implementation, with correct error types, command syntax, and debugging steps. Minor improvements could enhance visual presentation.

issues.description: MkDocs Material admonitions could enhance the 'Prevention Best Practices' section visibility
issues.fix_suggestion: Wrap each best practice in an admonition block (e.g., !!! tip 'Use commit_required Sparingly') for better visual distinction and consistency with other MapReduce documentation pages

issues.description: Section 4 'Test Agent Command Manually' contains an invalid shell script example that uses YAML syntax in a bash testing context
issues.current_content:
shell: |
  echo "content" > file.txt
  git add file.txt
  git commit -m "Test commit"
issues.should_be: Plain bash commands: echo "content" > file.txt && git add file.txt && git commit -m "Test commit"
issues.fix_suggestion: Replace the 'shell:' YAML syntax with plain bash commands since this example shows testing in a shell environment, not in a workflow file

positive_aspects: Comprehensive coverage of all common commit validation failure scenarios
Accurate error message examples matching actual codebase output
Correct CommitValidationFailed error type documentation matching src/cook/execution/mapreduce/event.rs:18
Good progression from problem identification to solution
Correct DLQ JSON structure matching DlqItem implementation
Valid internal links to related documentation pages
Practical debugging steps with real CLI commands
Correctly documents prodigy dlq analyze command which exists in src/cli/commands/dlq.rs:26-32
improvement_suggestions: Add MkDocs Material admonitions to highlight warnings and tips
Consider adding a flowchart (Mermaid diagram) showing the commit validation decision tree
Add tabbed content for different commit_required scenarios (required vs optional)
Include code annotations for the YAML examples explaining each field
Fix the bash example in Section 4 'Test Agent Command Manually' to use valid shell syntax

metadata.validation_focus: Auto-discovered page - check for drift and enhance with visual features
